title: Cant connect to the Server
body:
I hope anyone can help me. 
today i decided to take my laptop and play with a good friend, so we play 2 games and everything is fine.... than we searching for another one and after we choose character ... nothing i mean there was a black screen and after a few seconds a notification that i cant connect to the Server.. by the way my friend can with the same internet ip ... so i decided to try again at home. The same thing. I delete lol and reinstall, nothing. i Delet the client and install new, the same Problem... WTF is wrong pls help me i want to play some games!!   sry for my bad english (raging mode).
Thx for help bros

replies.body: This connection error can happen if your network is having problems reaching our game servers.  The black screen further affirms this because it's failing to render assets properly.  Reinstalling won't really resolve a connection issue in this case.  Instead, go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix it up.  Test it out in a custom game to be sure!  Let me know if you have any questions!
